data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Kashiwa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 2, Kashiwa push upfield but Hiroyuki Kimura quickly pulls them for offside.
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Cerezo throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
In the minute 3, Hiroyuki Kimura awards the away team a throw-in.
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 7, Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Richardson of Kashiwa gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 8, Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the away team in Osaka.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
Kashiwa's Michael Olunga gets in a shot on goal at Yanmar Stadium Nagai. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 16, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Cerezo.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
In the minute 20, Ataru Esaka (Kashiwa) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Cerezo defenders.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Cerezo throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Kashiwa's Ataru Esaka breaks free at Yanmar Stadium Nagai. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Kashiwa in the half of Cerezo.
Hiroshi Kiyotake for Cerezo drives towards goal at Yanmar Stadium Nagai. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Richardson is booked for the away team.
In the minute 29, In Osaka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Takuma Ominami for Kashiwa has been booked by Hiroyuki Kimura and receives a first yellow card.
Naoyuki Fujita (Cerezo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 30, Can Cerezo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 32, Kashiwa are pushing forward but Michael Olunga's finish is wide of the goal.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Cerezo a goal kick.
In Osaka Cerezo drive forward through Tatsuhiro Sakamoto. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 33, Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Cerezo have a goal kick.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Cerezo to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 37, Free kick Cerezo.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Cerezo throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
In the minute 38, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Cerezo throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 40, In Osaka, Ataru Esaka (Kashiwa) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 44, Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Osaka.
In the minute 45, Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Kashiwa's Tatsuya Yamashita misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
In the minute 45, Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
The first-half is over at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Hiroyuki Kimura has blown to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
In the minute 46, Nelsinho Baptista is making the team's first substitution at Yanmar Stadium Nagai with Yusuke Kobayashi replacing Masatoshi Mihara.
In the minute 47, Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Osaka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 49, Attention is being given to Cerezo’s Yasuki Kimoto and play has been suspended briefly.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Cerezo a goal kick.
Yasuki Kimoto (Cerezo) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Yusuke Maruhashi.
In the minute 53, In Osaka Cerezo attack through Hiroshi Kiyotake. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Osaka.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Hiroshi Kiyotake gets his shot on target but fails to score for Cerezo.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
Ataru Esaka (Kashiwa) strikes at Yanmar Stadium Nagai but his header is cleared.
In the minute 57, Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hiroaki Okuno of Cerezo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kashiwa are caught offside.
In the minute 60, The home team have replaced Bruno Pereira Mendes with Yuta Toyokawa. This is the second substitution made today by Miguel Angel Lotina.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Cerezo a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Throw-in Kashiwa.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 67, Yuta Toyokawa (Cerezo) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 71, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kashiwa.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Cerezo's Yuta Toyokawa gets in a shot on goal at Yanmar Stadium Nagai. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 74, Kashiwa are coming forward and Michael Olunga gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
Hiroyuki Kimura waits before resuming play because Richardson for Kashiwa is still down.
In the minute 75, Richardson for Kashiwa is back on the field again.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Cerezo throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 77, Free kick Kashiwa.
Naoyuki Fujita (Cerezo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 79, The away team replace Kengo Kitazume with Shunki Takahashi.
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 82, Kashiwa make their third substitution with Hiroto Goya replacing Ataru Esaka.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Free kick in a good position for Cerezo!
In the minute 83, Hiroto Goya (Kashiwa) has received a yellow card from Hiroyuki Kimura.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 86, Jun Nishikawa is on a sub for Tatsuhiro Sakamoto for Cerezo.
Hiroto Goya of Kashiwa gets in a strike, but is off target.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
In the minute 88, In Osaka, Cerezo push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Cerezo throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
In the minute 89, Cerezo advance rapidly upfield but Hiroyuki Kimura blows for offside.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
Kashiwa's Michael Olunga gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Cerezo a goal kick.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Cerezo.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a throw-in for Cerezo, close to Kashiwa's area.
Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Cerezo needs to be cautious. Kashiwa have an attacking throw-in.
The match has come to a close in Osaka. The final score is 0-0.
At Yanmar Stadium Nagai, Yusuke Maruhashi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
